newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Market Facts upgraded.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Market Facts upgraded.

text.p: Everen Securities said on Monday it raised its intermediate-term rating on the shares of Market Facts Inc to outperform from market perform, and maintained its long-term outperform rating on the stock.
-- Analyst Bob Craig said he raised his six-month price target to $15 per share from $13 and his 18-month target to $18 per share from $16.
-- Craig said his upgrade was based on strong fundamentals and an attractive valuation.
-- "We have a sense that through the first two months of the second quarter, the company's business trends have been very favorable," he said.
-- Market Facts shares were up 1-1/8 at 12-1/8.
